title: Zambos caught every moment in Qatar
content: The 2022 World Cup caught us with many emotions and the incomparable flavor of Zambos. With its campaign “It’s time for Qatar”, Zambos accompanied you in every match, inviting you to enjoy your passion for your favorite national team. Let yourself be trapped by the flavor of Zambos and the passion for soccer.The 2022 World Cup caught us with many emotions and the incomparable flavor of Zambos. With its campaign “It’s time for Qatar”, Zambos accompanied you in every match, inviting you to enjoy your passion for your favorite national team. Let yourself be trapped by the flavor of Zambos and the passion for soccer.
